snippet: Alejandro Valverde rebounded from missing the podium at the Tour de France by winning the San Sebastián Classic in Spain.
abstract: Cyclist Alejandro Valverde wins the San Sebastian Classic in Spain.
lead_paragraph: Alejandro Valverde rebounded from missing the podium at the Tour de France by winning the San Sebastián Classic in Spain.

headline.main: Valverde Wins Cycling Race in Spain
headline.print_headline: Valverde Bounces Back to Win in Spain
